comments.author: sidrabbit@ya.ru
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

"Clear Recent History" always wipes cache completely, even if a certain time range was selected.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Ensure your cache is enabled and has some files more than an hour old.
2. Press Ctrl+Shift+Delete to open "Clear Recent History" dialog.
3. Change time range to "Last Hour", then open "Details" and check "Cache".
4. Click the "Clear Now" button.
Actual Results:  
Cache is completely empty.

Expected Results:  
Only items matching the time range should be deleted from cache.
comments.creator: sidrabbit@ya.ru
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

"Clear Recent History" always wipes cache completely, even if a certain time range was selected.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Ensure your cache is enabled and has some files more than an hour old.
2. Press Ctrl+Shift+Delete to open "Clear Recent History" dialog.
3. Change time range to "Last Hour", then open "Details" and check "Cache".
4. Click the "Clear Now" button.
Actual Results:  
Cache is completely empty.

Expected Results:  
Only items matching the time range should be deleted from cache.
Did you check the Age of the Entries by using about:cache?device=disk?
comments.author: xtc4uall@gmail.com
comments.creator: xtc4uall@gmail.com
comments.text: Did you check the Age of the Entries by using about:cache?device=disk?

(In reply to comment #1)
> Did you check the Age of the Entries by using about:cache?device=disk?

Yes, under "Last modified" column.

(In reply to comment #1)
> Did you check the Age of the Entries by using about:cache?device=disk?

Yes, under "Last modified" column.

comments.author: sumyungguy99@gmail.com
comments.text:
I can confirm seeing this on 16.0.2 release for Mac...
Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.8; rv:16.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/16.0
comments.creator: sumyungguy99@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
I can confirm seeing this on 16.0.2 release for Mac...
Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.8; rv:16.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/16.0

comments.text:
Any update on this?

My Internet connection is very slow and expensive so I used large cache storage for better web surfing. Yesterday my friend used my laptop to check his mail. I cleared all the data during last hour and closed browser. After starting it again, I've noticed things loading much slower and from about:cache saw all disk caches are cleared out.. I'm sure it contained +100MB last week that I checked it to diagnose a web designing problem.

And Today i reproduced same problem.. On Firefox 18, Gentoo linux build.
comments.raw_text:
